# The `WebAssemblySetP2AlignOperands.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file sets the p2align operands on load and store instructions. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file sets the p2align operands on load and store instructions.

<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// WebAssembly does not currently support supernatural alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  P2Align = std::min(P2Align,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     uint64&#95;t(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/webassembly/#a2a5d29a901287f6b88bf88e4d812f625">WebAssembly::GetDefaultP2Align</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode())));</span></CodeLine>
